subject: Education
title: Belonging Uncertainty and Academic Performance
description: A fast breakdown of Belonging Uncertainty and Academic Performance for builders.

hook.text: A student wonders: 'Do people like me even belong in this class?'

buildup.text: Belonging uncertainty disproportionately affects students from underrepresented groups.

discovery.text: Walton and Cohen found a brief belonging intervention closed the GPA gap over three years.

twist.text: The intervention lasted just one hourâ€”a writing exercise about shared struggles.

climax.text: Feeling you belong reframes setbacks as normal, not evidence of not fitting in.

punchline.text: One hour of belonging can redirect an entire academic trajectory.

quiz.question: What did Walton and Cohen's belonging intervention achieve?
options: It closed the GPA gap for underrepresented students over three years
It improved attendance but not grades
